review_data.title: 100% Recommendable
review_data.content: Was there with my girlfriend who is super into scandinavian culture. The place is super modern with friendly staff and special food. Definately not the last time we have been there.

review_data.title: Absolutely positively surprised!
review_data.content: Incredibly tasty dishes, freshly made & beautifully decorated. I expected good, but got great 👍🏽 definitely will come back. review_data.title: Friendly atmosphere, good food

review_data.title: Gerne Wieder
review_data.content: Unkompliziert, einfach und sehr guter Service. Bin nicht viel in dieser Gegend, aber fürs Tillsamman komme ich gerne wieder.

review_data.title: Great food, cool interieur

review_data.title: Great place, friendly an welcoming with splendid food
review_data.content: This place is a gem. The bright restaurant is good for a relaxing lunch or lunch meeting. There is also a section where you can lounge on the sofa and enjoying delicious coffee.

review_data.title: My favourite hangout in Zurich
